channel.title: My Mapper's Level
channel.description: Well I'm starting my own mod settled in Black Mesa time (Not Planning on adding Houndeyes, and custom NPCs, though) and I got a mapper (finally) who made a "broken" part of Black Mesa, and you will forgive him for not making it look like HL1 , We are trying to slightly differ from the traditional HL1 look. But anyway here it is: [url]https://www.moddb.com/mods/black-mesa-no-escaping/videos[/url]

item.title: My Mapper's Level
item.dc:creator: Sauce
item.description:
Someonerandm:

I can see how that would happen. I’ve just seen some where a guy literally picked up every physics prop on the map. It can just get out of hand.

heh, hell,I made a video where I broke every prop in the map and hit every brush. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8PlGJ34yvEk don’t worry that’s an extremely OLD alpha map that has been remade, the video in the OP is the broken version of the remake.

Read full topic

item.title: My Mapper's Level
item.dc:creator: Sauce
item.description:
Sauce:

I think thats gmod, one of the screenshots look like that gordon freeman NPC download holding an SMG with a stolen map from another mod I forgot the name but I downloaded it from PlanetPhilip https://www.moddb.com/members/tristentristen10/images/black-mesa-source#imagebox make your own material people

I remember the mod, now “Transitions” https://www.planetphillip.com/posts/transitions-half-life-2/

item.title: My Mapper's Level
item.dc:creator: Sauce
item.description:
Scrawny:

You mean to say that you don’t shoot at randomly when you are testing a map?

I know I do. I have no reason to, but its just something that happens.

yes, whenever Im recording with fraps I’m like “ummmmmm well here’s the map and uh… yall are looking at it… I guess I can show you guys prop and wall impact reactions” breaks every prop

Read full topic

item.title: My Mapper's Level
item.dc:creator: Scrawny
item.description:
Someonerandm:

It looks good, if a little blocky and poorly lit, but I have a general question for everyone who makes these videos:
Why do you find it necessary to either shoot or pickup random things? Yes, we know that they will react when shot or that physics exists. We do not need you to show us this.

That will be all.

You mean to say that you don’t shoot at randomly when you are testing a map?

I know I do. I have no reason to, but its just something that happens.

Read full topic

item.description:
I’m beginning to add the final touches, sorry for bad spelling and gramar, it’s late at night, so I’m almost of the bed.

item.title: My Mapper's Level

item.description:
Yeah, I’ve been know to leave my computer on for weeks, and its always on in the background. You can see what happens.

item.title: My Mapper's Level
item.dc:creator: Jethrosoup
item.description:
Someonerandm:

Oh yeah, I finally closed that. I basically run it as a background process, but I figured I might as well shut it down before my friend starts bothering me about the ridiculous amount of time steam says I spend in it.

Holy shoot; 2268.2 hours. :fffuuu:

Read full topic

item.title: My Mapper's Level

item.description:
The ModDB Page:

Note: This is a Fan Fiction Turned into a mod, anything Regarding Gordon having a cousin will be removed, thanks - Gavyn

Just noticed this as well.

item.title: My Mapper's Level
item.dc:creator: Someonerandm
item.description:
jethrosoup:

Someone… you’re not in Source SDK…

Every time I’ve seen your Steam status thing, that’s what you’ve been in.

Oh yeah, I finally closed that. I basically run it as a background process, but I figured I might as well shut it down before my friend starts bothering me about the ridiculous amount of time steam says I spend in it.

Read full topic

I admit my idea of that sounds a bit cheesy, I guess I wanted to give a relative to gordon.

item.title: My Mapper's Level
item.dc:creator: Deathmonkey7
item.description:
Cameron :smiley: :

Disable AdBlock

That did it.

It looked ok. There’s really nothing to go on here though. I’m sure this is extremely early, but I will say some of the pipes looked out of place. Some of the rooms looked a bit bare. The lighting was the best part though. Good job there.

Read full topic

item.title: My Mapper's Level
item.dc:creator: Sauce
item.description:
Someonerandm:

It looks good, if a little blocky and poorly lit, but I have a general question for everyone who makes these videos:
Why do you find it necessary to either shoot or pickup random things? Yes, we know that they will react when shot or that physics exists. We do not need you to show us this.

That will be all.

Thanks, I am tweaking the light right now, as for you’re blocky statement if you look closely the corners consist of arches in some places. but suggestions for lighting types would be appreciated.

Read full topic
